titleStmt.title: The zealovs Christian taking heaven by holy violence in severall sermons, tending to direct men how to hear with zeal, [how] to pray with importunity / preached by ... Mr. Christopher Love ...
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. and W. Leybourn for John Rothwell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
